uvi.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.14.14
uvi.description:
iio: adis16475: fix deadlock on frequency set

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.14 by commit 04e03b907022ebd876f422f17efcc2c6cc934dc6, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 39c024b51b5607e9d2fc6c04c2573e4a778c728d. For more details please see the references link.
